channel.title: 508 - Frames

item.title: 508 - Frames
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Before you read this, I would like you all to know, if you do not know how to code, or have little experience, then please leave.

Hi guys, I just recently created a new updated to my server, that has alot of coding with frames. As you can see, here’s one of my Frames.Java methods:

public void ResetGEItem(Player p, int slot) { p.stream.createFrame(137); p.stream.writeUnsignedByte(slot); p.stream.writeUnsignedByte(0); }

However, whenever I use this frame, (it works) except I logout everytime it’s used. Say I put this method in a command, to test it, or if I talk to an NPC and have this method used while talking to that NPC, or even if I put this method for when someonme clicks an object, you would automatically logout.

Can someone help me with this? Is it the methods used, or is it just a frame type error? ~ Thanks, much appreciated.

Read full topic
